summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 K-Z SPORTSMEN. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE LOCK ON THE FRONT DOOR FAILED TO LOCK OR UNLOCK. THE CONTACT COULD ONLY ENTER THE VEHICLE FROM THE REAR PASSENGER DOOR. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE DOOR LATCH ASSEMBLY NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 800.
